Articles.Content:
I am a big fan of the show Lost and the Dharma Initiative. I was planning to make a mod, that made Dharma-themed science experiments; as well as a new (space)station. Sadly, i abandoned the project. I made a flag for the occasion. If anyone wants to use it in any way, shape, or form, they may.

If you want to download it, use this link "http://i.imgur.com/QWQglvw.jpg" or download from the page below.

I have a screenshot of how it looks in-game included.

![JuMWeYv.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JuMWeYv.jpg)

(Hope you like it)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![QWQglvw.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QWQglvw.jpg)
